text:
#RoadToRecovery continues: 11months #Cancer free, 1 yr tobacco free, got the Hell out of TX last Sept, legal #cannabis fully embraced. Happy, healthy,  energized, down 35+ lbs. I intend to fully celebrate my 1st yr mark, Rona or no Rona!
#WellnessWednesday #ItsThursday #WhoCares https://t.co/kDE5aW38Le
